prayer_invitation.title: Prayer of faith, for eternal life!
prayer_invitation.done_message:
I already did it üôè
Don't show again
prayer_invitation.instruction: Repeat this prayer out loud, with faith and believing with all your heart:
prayer_invitation.prayer_text:
Jesus Christ, I believe that you died on the cross for me, I ask for forgiveness and I repent from my heart for my sins. I ask you to be my Savior and the lord of my life. Free me from eternal death and write my name in the book of life.
In the mighty name of Jesus, amen.
prayer_invitation.promises:
If you made this prayer and believe it:
You and your house will be saved (Acts 16:31)
You will live eternally (Jn 11:25-26)
You will never thirst again (Jn 4:14)
You will be with Christ in heaven (Rev 19:9)
There is joy in heaven when a sinner repents (Luke 15:10)
It is written and God is faithful (Dt 7:9)

From now on you have salvation and new life in Jesus Christ.
